name: Neymar Jr
comments: Good build quality and great sound quality. Addresses all the issues of its predecessor, the ZS6, and improves in nearly all areas.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
comments: Really nice, need to tweak a lot with an equalizer to get the proper sound, sometime the high frequencies can be harsh, for example when using Apple Music from an iPhone, EQ presets are not enough, but from a Mac Mini M1 is a different story, using a Topping D10 and a Yamaha amp with Jriver, the sound is not wide but using different plugins

name: Lionel Messi
comments: Everything this was great, the package was nicely packed with bubble wrap also the iems were intact. Using them for 2 days now it has a sparkly sound good for rock music. It's pairing well with my Fiio m3pro. Iam using the trn T2 upgrade cable cause the stock cable causes a lot of noise.

name: Shah Rukh Khan
comments: Very Good in ear headphone. Good for gaming & music. Overall the headphone quality is good at this price range.

name: Salman Khan
comments: The sound of kbear lark is balanced. As I am a bass lover this product doesn’t suit me properly. The treble effect produce a hissss type noise. But the fitting is good and vocals are amazing to hear. If you are a balaced sound lover then you can buy it. The bass quantity is good but quality is bad. Mid bass will impress you but there are much lackings of sub bass.

name: Hero Alom
comments: The sound of kbear lark is balanced. As I am a bass lover this product doesn’t suit me properly. The treble effect produce a hissss type noise. But the fitting is good and vocals are amazing to hear. If you are a balaced sound lover then you can buy it. The bass quantity is good but quality is bad.
